title: Highlight Conserved Edits Across Versions of a Document
text: page_highlight produce HTML output can rendered highlighted text. can done R Markdown specifying object outside code chunk `r page_highlight`, knitting document HTML. image generated resulting html output (seen vignette("highlightr")).
code: library(highlightr) comment_example_rename <- dplyr::rename(comment_example, page_notes=Notes) toks_comment <- token_comments(comment_example_rename) transcript_example_rename <- dplyr::rename(transcript_example, text=Text) toks_transcript <- token_transcript(transcript_example_rename) collocation_object <- collocate_comments_fuzzy(toks_transcript, toks_comment) #> Warning in join_func(a = a, b = b, by_a = by_a, by_b = by_b, block_by_a = block_by_a, : A pair of records at the threshold (0.7) have only a 95% chance of being compared. #> Please consider changing `n_bands` and `band_width`. merged_frequency <- transcript_frequency(transcript_example_rename, collocation_object) freq_plot <- collocation_plot(merged_frequency) page_highlight <- highlighted_text(freq_plot) page_highlight

title: Collocation of Comments — collocate_comments
text: function provides frequency collocations comments correspond provided transcript.

title: Collocation of Comments — collocate_comments
text: transcript_token transcript token act baseline notes, resulting token_transcript() note_token tokenized document notes, resulting token_comments() collocate_length length collocation. Default 5

title: Collocation of Comments — collocate_comments
text: data frame transcript corresponding note frequency

title: Collocation of Comments — collocate_comments
code: comment_example_rename <- dplyr::rename(comment_example, page_notes=Notes) toks_comment <- token_comments(comment_example_rename[1:100,]) transcript_example_rename <- dplyr::rename(transcript_example, text=Text) toks_transcript <- token_transcript(transcript_example_rename) collocation_object <- collocate_comments(toks_transcript, toks_comment) #> Joining with `by = join_by(tolower.unlist.descript_ngrams..)` #> Joining with `by = join_by(collocation)` #> Joining with `by = join_by(word_number)`

title: Collocate Comments Fuzzy — collocate_comments_fuzzy
text: function provides frequency collocations comments correspond provided transcript, using fuzzy matching.

title: Collocate Comments Fuzzy — collocate_comments_fuzzy
code: collocate_comments_fuzzy(   transcript_token,   note_token,   collocate_length = 5,   n_bands = 50,   threshold = 0.7 )

title: Collocate Comments Fuzzy — collocate_comments_fuzzy
text: transcript_token transcript token act baseline notes, resulting token_transcript() note_token tokenized document notes, resulting token_comments() collocate_length length collocation. Default 5 n_bands number bands used MinHash algorithm passed zoomerjoin::jaccard_right_join(). Default 50 threshold considered match Jaccard distance passed zoomerjoin::jaccard_right_join(). Default 0.7

title: Collocate Comments Fuzzy — collocate_comments_fuzzy
text: data frame transcript corresponding note frequency

title: Collocate Comments Fuzzy — collocate_comments_fuzzy
code: comment_example_rename <- dplyr::rename(comment_example[1:10,], page_notes=Notes) toks_comment <- token_comments(comment_example_rename) transcript_example_rename <- dplyr::rename(transcript_example, text=Text) toks_transcript <- token_transcript(transcript_example_rename) fuzzy_object <- collocate_comments_fuzzy(toks_transcript, toks_comment) #> Joining with `by = join_by(unlist.descript_ngrams.)` #> Joining with `by = join_by(collocation)` #> Joining with `by = join_by(collocation)` #> Warning: A pair of records at the threshold (0.7) have only a 95% chance of being compared. #> Please consider changing `n_bands` and `band_width`. #> Joining with `by = join_by(collocation.y)` #> Joining with `by = join_by(collocation)` #> Joining with `by = join_by(word_number)`

title: Map collocation to ggplot object — collocation_plot
text: list plot, plot object, frequency

title: Map collocation to ggplot object — collocation_plot
code: comment_example_rename <- dplyr::rename(comment_example, page_notes=Notes) toks_comment <- token_comments(comment_example_rename) transcript_example_rename <- dplyr::rename(transcript_example, text=Text) toks_transcript <- token_transcript(transcript_example_rename) collocation_object <- collocate_comments(toks_transcript, toks_comment) #> Joining with `by = join_by(tolower.unlist.descript_ngrams..)` #> Joining with `by = join_by(collocation)` #> Joining with `by = join_by(word_number)` merged_frequency <- transcript_frequency(transcript_example_rename, collocation_object) #> Joining with `by = join_by(to_merge)` #> Joining with `by = join_by(text, lines, n_words, words, word_num, word_length, #> x_coord, to_merge, stanza_freq, word_number)` freq_plot <- collocation_plot(merged_frequency)

title: Create Highlighted Testimony — highlighted_text
text: Adds html tags create highlighted testimony corresponding word frequency. render correctly, object produced highlighted_text() can added outside code chunk .Rmd document `r highlighted_text()` format.

text: plot_object plot object resulting collocation_plot() labels lower upper labels gradient scale

title: Create Highlighted Testimony — highlighted_text
text: html code highlighted text

title: Create Highlighted Testimony — highlighted_text
code: comment_example_rename <- dplyr::rename(comment_example, page_notes=Notes) toks_comment <- token_comments(comment_example_rename) transcript_example_rename <- dplyr::rename(transcript_example, text=Text) toks_transcript <- token_transcript(transcript_example_rename) collocation_object <- collocate_comments(toks_transcript, toks_comment) #> Joining with `by = join_by(tolower.unlist.descript_ngrams..)` #> Joining with `by = join_by(collocation)` #> Joining with `by = join_by(word_number)` merged_frequency <- transcript_frequency(transcript_example_rename, collocation_object) #> Joining with `by = join_by(to_merge)` #> Joining with `by = join_by(text, lines, n_words, words, word_num, word_length, #> x_coord, to_merge, stanza_freq, word_number)` freq_plot <- collocation_plot(merged_frequency) page_highlight <- highlighted_text(freq_plot, merged_frequency)

title: Mapping Collocation Frequency to Transcript Document — transcript_frequency
code: comment_example_rename <- dplyr::rename(comment_example, page_notes=Notes) toks_comment <- token_comments(comment_example_rename) transcript_example_rename <- dplyr::rename(transcript_example, text=Text) toks_transcript <- token_transcript(transcript_example_rename) collocation_object <- collocate_comments(toks_transcript, toks_comment) #> Joining with `by = join_by(tolower.unlist.descript_ngrams..)` #> Joining with `by = join_by(collocation)` #> Joining with `by = join_by(word_number)` merged_frequency <- transcript_frequency(transcript_example_rename, collocation_object) #> Joining with `by = join_by(to_merge)` #> Joining with `by = join_by(text, lines, n_words, words, word_num, word_length, #> x_coord, to_merge, stanza_freq, word_number)`

title: highlightr 1.1.2
text: CRAN release: 2025-06-26 Remove dependency fuzzyjoin package, use zoomerjoin package instead Change Levenshtein distance calculation fuzzy joins Jaccard distance Re-compute fuzzy weights based new distance calculation

title: highlightr 1.0.2
